author: Wuzzy
long_description:
This mod aims to help mod developers experimenting with L-system tree definitions. It provides a simple formspec which is a wrapper around minetest.spawn_tree with a lot of additional features. If you don’t know how this function or L-systems work, then this mod is not for you. You can check out Luanti’s official Lua API documentation to learn the basics.

Say “/treeform” in the chat to open the formspec or click on the extra button in your inventory menu when using Simple Fast Inventory Buttons or Unified Inventory.
name: ltool
short_description: A form to easily spawn L-system trees, aimed at mod developers.
title: L-System Tree Utility
